headline: Eli Lilly to Expand Pain Pipeline With $1B SiteOne Buyout Offer
summary: LLY inks $1B deal to acquire SiteOne, adding phase II-ready pain drug STC-004 to strengthen its neuroscience pipeline.

headline: Eli Lilly vs. AstraZeneca: Which Pharma Powerhouse is the Better Buy?
summary: Lilly dominates GLP-1 market but faces near-term headwinds, while AstraZeneca boasts steady growth, rising estimates and a higher dividend yield.
